title: Hooded scarf

claims.preamble: We claim the ornamental design for a hooded scarf, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a hooded scarf, showing our new design when in use and with the drawstring slack.
FIG. 2 is a perspective view thereof, with the drawstring tightened.
FIG. 3 is a front elevational view of the invention;
FIG. 4 is a rear elevational view of the invention;
FIG. 5 is a left-side elevational view of the invention;
FIG. 6 is a right-side elevational view of the invention;
FIG. 7 is a top plan view of the invention; and,
FIG. 8 is a bottom plan view of the invention.
The broken lines showing a person in FIGS. 1 and 2 are included for the purpose of illustrating the hooded scarf in use, and form no part of the claimed design.
